titles: The Rump roughly but righteously handled, in a new ballad to the tune of Cook Lorrel.
notes: Verse - "More sacks to the mill, here comes a fresh wit,".
In two states: a) third line of title ends "handled,"; b) third line of title ends "Handled."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
